title: Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
problem_summary: Given a string s, find the length of the longest substring without repeating characters.

quiz.question: What is the main idea to solve this problem efficiently?

options.text: Use a sliding window with two pointers and a hashmap to maintain unique characters
Use dynamic programming where dp[i] is the longest valid substring ending at i
Generate all substrings and check uniqueness using a set
Sort the string and count unique characters

key_insight: When a repeated character is found, move the left pointer just after its last occurrence.
